parseODP

public void parseODP(java.lang.String language)
Read ODP RDF dump and create a file for classification. Format: URL Class1/Class2[/ClassX]* Save URLs in several files that can be merged later.

Parameters:
language - If set to something other than "english", the Top/World/X categories are used.

createRandomSample

public void createRandomSample(java.lang.String sourceFile,
                               int sampleSize)
Create a random sample of URLs.

Parameters:
sourceFile - The file with the URLs to sample from.
sampleSize - The size of the sample.

cleanup

public void cleanup(boolean deleteXMLParts)
Delete helper files.

Parameters:
deleteXMLParts - If true, the xml parts will be deleted as well.
